synopsis.text: Eye ing his next challenge, Goku, the solitary private investigator equipped with a technologically advanced cybernetic eye, finds himself entangled in a web of intrigue and danger. Hired by the enigmatic and frightened Ryoko, his mission is to locate her missing brother, Ryu. As he delves deeper into the case, he uncovers a sinister plot involving military genetic experiments, cover-ups, and a relentless quest for vengeance. With the military's robotic hounds hot on his heels, Goku realizes that his adversary possesses powers that rival his own. As he navigates through a labyrinth of betrayal, murder, and manipulation, Goku must summon all his strength, intelligence, and willpower to confront an indestructible killing machine who leaves a chilling trail of bodies in his wake. Will Goku's omnipotent cybernetic eye and versatile scepter be enough to save the man he was hired to find, or will he be forced to make the ultimate decision? Prepare for a thrilling ride in this final installment of Midnight Eye action!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
